text:
Since my chilhood, i love lisening music, everyday, when i can I lisen music.
 Before, I didn't know that i can work in music even if i can't play an instrument or have a nice voice.
But when the covid 19 and the lock down has arrived, i lisen music more than ever, music have help me everyday to overcome the situation.
So naturally, i discover more genre in music, and one genre in particular : kpop.
I lisen kpop since 2018 but even more in 2020. I lisen kpop for their aesthetic, their song and their personality, who help me a lot during the pandemic
 And i ask myself how i could get closer to them ? And then the job of manager come to my head.
So I have search how i could become manager and what i had to go through to do it !
And then the license "infomation-communication" has arrived.
So now i am more ethousiam to become an manager to help them everyday in their day-life, travel all around the word, discover new culture, new landscape, new people, overall new adventure !
To conclude, the child me would be happy to know that we will finally be able to work in the music world and that i will finally realize my dream !
